headline: Partner at Diagram Ventures
summary:
My Experience
Multi-disciplinary Business and Technology leader with 25 years of Experience as an:
• Executive Manager, Business Developer and Board Member
• Venture Capital & Private Equity investor
• Management Consultant 

across a large range of Industries:
•	Information Technology (Internet, Software, Hardware, Services)
•	Financial Institutions (Asset Management, Insurance, Banking)
•	Manufacturing and Distribution (Aerospace, Industrial Equipment) 
•	Non-Profits (Economic Development, Alternative Dispute Resolution)

My Distinctive Value Proposition
• Pragmatic Strategic problem solver
• Focused on creating sustainable impact for all stakeholders
• Experienced at leveraging Technology to create and grow businesses
• International experience and perspective (bilingual, dual citizen of Canada & US, studied in North America & Europe, worked on every major continent)

My Passions
• Making a Difference / Solving Problems / achieving sustainable impact
• Building / Growing / Developing Companies and Organizations

Always looking for interesting Startup / Investment Opportunities or just Networking. 

I can be reached at: frederic.latreille@gmail.com

Common misspelling: Frederic Latrielle

experiences.title: Partner
experiences.description:
Diagram co-founds companies that pursue big ideas in the financial, insurance and healthcare sectors. We combine venture capital investment, incubator-style support and the unfair advantages of large incumbents into a unique, founder-centric model. As a leading venture builder, Diagram offers founders a unique platform to launch a business, scale it, and pursue global success.

Key investors include Portag3 Ventures LP, a corporate partnership exclusively sponsored by Power Financial Corporation, IGM Financial Inc. and Great-West Lifeco Inc., and a group of more than 80 individual investors who provide Diagram’s projects with an unmatched wealth of perspective, mentorship and connections.

experiences.title: Investor & Advisor
experiences.description: Mako is a SaaS platform for financial client management: onboarding/KYC, portfolio reporting, and compliance automation. We turn in-person ID checks, paper KYC forms and mailed reports into delightful digital experiences.

experiences.title: Investor, Advisor & past Board Member
experiences.description: Ossiaco's mission is to deliver energy that lets you live a life without compromise. Ossiaco sits at the nexus of residential solar power, electric vehicle charging, the smart home and customer-centric utilities. The Ossiaco team has a proven history of rethinking energy distribution for everything from large utility customers to distributed energy resource providers. Its AI-driven sustainable technologies enable people to leverage solar energy to power their cars, their homes and their lifestyles. Ossiaco owns numerous worldwide patents in power electronics and power conversion and is backed by a number of globally respected investors.

experiences.title: Investor & Advisor
experiences.description: XpertSea is a Canadian technology company headquartered in Québec City, Canada, that designs, develops, and sells hardware and software solutions for the global aquaculture industry. The XpertSea platform combines complementary electronic products and software services for quality assessment and population monitoring of an aquaculture production.

experiences.title: Board Member
experiences.description: Founded in 1996, the Society for Arts and Technology [SAT] is a non-profit organization recognized internationally for its active, leading role in developing immersive technologies, augmented reality and creative use of high-speed networks. With its triple mission as a center for artists, research and education, SAT was created to support a new generation of creators/researchers in the digital age.

experiences.title: Investor, Advisor & past Board Member
experiences.description: Investor, board member and advisor to CEO and management team to grow the successfully proven Amilia web technology platform. Amilia is a cloud web platform for membership based organizations that helps them manage and keep track of all their operations in one place, from sales, memberships and events, to client management, promotions, payments and revenues.

experiences.title: Board Member
experiences.description: Investor and Board Member. YUL Ventures is a technology-focused growth advisory and venture capital firm investing in early stages of promising companies typically based in Montreal. We are particularly active with internet-centric entrepreneurs that rely on platforms and marketplaces to create sustainable network effects and high-velocity go-to-market strategies.

experiences.title: Investor & Advisor (Wirkn - acquired by JobGet)
experiences.description: JobGet is the Social Job Network for the Everyday Worker. It is the fastest-growing app for job seekers in the service industries, supporting restaurants, food service, retail, customer support, hospitality, healthcare, warehouse, trucking, and more! It uses skill-based matching to expand the candidate pool by 8x, connecting hiring companies with high-intent, qualified candidates you won’t find on traditional job sites.

experiences.title: Board Member & President (Marine Press - merged with Chartco & acquired by Lloyd's)
experiences.description: In September 2022, Lloyd's Register acquired OneOcean which was the result of the November 2019 merger of Marine Press of Canada and ChartCo Limited to create the largest e-Navigation solutions company that is brings digitization to the global maritime industry. The business supports more than 16,000 vessels in their regulatory compliance and navigational activities, by providing innovative and integrated software solutions designed specifically for onboard and shoreside teams. With extensive investment in R&D, OneOcean is leading the way in enabling the maritime sector to plan out and maintain a globally sustainable future - reinforcing safer, cleaner and more efficient working practices throughout the shipping industry.

experiences.title: Member LPAC
experiences.description: TandemLaunch scouts, accelerates, and commercializes early-stage technologies from the world's top universities in close partnership with major Consumer Electronic brands. It collaborates with innovative entrepreneurs and technologists to turn these initial ideas into high quality startup ventures that our partners then lead to international impact. TandemLaunch specializes in multimedia technologies including: video and image processing and encoding, display technologies, content tracking, audio rendering, haptics, and human-computer interfaces.

education.school: Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management

volunteer_work.title: Co-founder and Board Member
volunteer_work.description: Million Peacemakers is an organization that teaches the art of everyday peacemaking. Using our conflict resolution method – the Nonflict way – we empower families, businesses and communities to resolve conflicts that arise every day. Through education and partnerships we are creating a legacy of 1 million peacemakers co-creating a culture of peace in the world.

volunteer_work.title: Consultant-advisor
volunteer_work.description: Ashoka identifies and supports the world's leading social entrepreneurs, learns from the patterns in their innovations, and mobilizes a global community that embraces these new frameworks to build an "everyone a changemaker world."

volunteer_work.title: Consultant-advisor
volunteer_work.description: Save The Children works to ensure children have healthcare, food and shelter, as well as learning and child protection services when children need it most. It is committed to helping all children achieve their full potential by ensuring they grow up healthy, receive a good education, and stay safe.

volunteer_work.title: Consultant-advisor
volunteer_work.description: CECI is an international cooperation organization founded in 1958 that combats poverty and exclusion through sustainable development projects in Africa, Asia and the Americas.
